attributes.action: award an MBE to Daniel Joseph Wilson, first team manager of Hartlepool United FC, for services to football and British sport
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Danny Wilson took unfashionable Barnsley to the Premiership in 1997 and knocked Man United out of the FA Cup quarter finals in 1994.

In 2007 he has taken League Two side Hartlepool United to the brink of their first Championship title with a record breaking TWENTY THREE CONSECUTIVE wins and 88 points as of May 1st 2007.
